mods:titleInfo.mods:title: North America Black Historical Museum button

mods:mods.mods:abstract: Image consists of one round, white, metal button. At the centre is a stylized image of a white maple leaf superimposed on a black tree. To the right of this image is a white drinking gourd. To the left of this image is a black cross superimposed on a white diamond shape. Below these images in uppercase, black text reads:"Amherstburg, Canada".
